title: ❅  Holiday skins!  What would you want to see?  ❅
body:
If the Skins Team was under your complete control, what skins would you make for the holidays?

This time period encompasses October through January. Would love to see some ideas for other holidays we haven't necessarily celebrated in skin form yet!

Can you explain what it would look like? Sometimes concepts SOUND amazing but then in execution you find it's a lot harder than it initially seemed.... :'3

As someone who's seen the Northern Lights before, it's not as hard as you think. For outfit, think traditional female Frelijord garb with an ornately carved wooden wand. For the abilities, imagine the Aurora Borealis wrapping you like the winds within a tornado and you've got the VFX for Light Binding right there. Lucent Singularity would be a brilliantly glowing ball of auroras emitting wisps as it sits on the rift. Prismatic Barrier would be having Lux toss her wand out; as the wand twirls in the air it leaves a tail of aurora energy like a comet. When the barrier hits an ally have auroras surround that ally in a barrier form. As for Final Spark, this image does it justice.

Underworld {{champion:236}} 

He travels to the depths of the underworld to seek knowledge on how to free Senna from the lantern, and rises with a cold, ghastly vengeance.

Could be an interesting story about his passion for Senna drove him to drastic measures, perhaps even making a pact with those he despises just so he could destroy Thresh and free her tortured soul.
****
"And why would I help you?" The ghoul spat with clear contempt for the Purifier. He had barely made eye contact before several, brilliant holes pierced its spectral visage, floating in pieces to the ebon soil.

"You just did." The cliff he approached scaled over a swirling pit of souls, howling in their torment. It was the work of vile sorcery and ancient nercromancy that held them place, and he could not help but grimace at their pain.

He had crossed the border of life and death, being here in of itself was a sin, yet he found himself reluctant to sacrifice his body and soul. Is it worth everything to see her face once more? As he gazed into the emerald pit he found himself ever more repulsed by the magic within, and with horror he called upon its strength.

As if on their own free will the souls rushed to their new host, ravaging his cloth and tainting his very essence. The process was excruciating, his mind nearly slipping from its seams beneath the waves of pain. 

What seemed centuries later his eyes came to focus on his phantom form, his twin relics corrupted with a sickly green energy. Each step brought on its own misery, and as he approached the gates to the overworld only one word escaped his lips,

"Senna..."
